quest.name: Bringing the Nibbles
journal:
 Quest Sync
Xorutt is poised to continue with his instruction of ale-related customs.
objectives: Obtain iguana tails from upland iguanas.
Deliver the iguana tails to Xorutt.
Deliver the barrel of fermenting ale to the Tholl alewife.

dialogue.name: XORUTT
dialogue.text: The seeds are almost set to ferment! What we need now is some tasty nibbles to complement the booze!

dialogue.name: XORUTT
dialogue.text: ...What's that look for? A dwarf can't live on grog alone, though for some it ain't for lack of trying.

dialogue.name: XORUTT
dialogue.text: Anyhow, the traditional side dish to a pint of dwarven ale is a nice big plate of dried iguana tails!

dialogue.name: XORUTT
dialogue.text: Lizards don't just hand over their body parts, of course, so you'll have to go chop 'em off yourself. It's something of a custom to show off your best trophies and share them with your fellows come drinking time─a real bonding experience!

dialogue.name: XORUTT
dialogue.text: You'll find iguanas─and their tasty tails─to the southeast of town. Two should be enough, seeing as them scalekin are so bloody huge. ...Oh, did I not mention that? Well, good hunting!

dialogue.name: XORUTT
dialogue.text: Head to the southeast of here─that's where the iguanas tend to wander. You might try lopping off a tail and making a run for it, but you'd be better off expecting a fight.

dialogue.name: XORUTT
dialogue.text: Ah, the mighty lizard hunter returns! What have you got for me?

dialogue.name: XORUTT
dialogue.text: Oh! Look at the size of them wriggling beauties! Once we set those out to dry, the shrinking'll enhance the flavor so's you can enjoy the full lizardy goodness with every mouthful!

dialogue.name: XORUTT
dialogue.text: And speaking of flavor, I've got the seeds steeped and sealed. For the next step, we need to store the ale-to-be in the brewhouse so it can ferment somewhere cool and dry.

dialogue.name: XORUTT
dialogue.text: You up for it? Of course you are. Just roll this barrel over to the alewife, and she'll be happy to give it a home.

dialogue.name: XORUTT
dialogue.text: I know it's a long trip, but I reckon you can manage it. And roll, don't lift─that's a rookie mistake!

dialogue.name: DWARFA03562
dialogue.text: Aye?

dialogue.name: DWARFA03562
dialogue.text: Ah, getting a firsthand look at the brewing process, are you? Good for you, lasslad! There's naught better in this life than making your own grog, eh?

dialogue.name: Q1
dialogue.text: What will you say?

dialogue.name: A1
dialogue.text: Aye...naught better.

dialogue.name: A1
dialogue.text: It's certainly an experience...

dialogue.name: A1
dialogue.text: I wouldn't say that exactly...

dialogue.name: DWARFA03562
dialogue.text: Gwahahaha!!! Trust me, lasslad─the more you have to work for it, the better it tastes! And the last step ain't near as grueling, I promise you.

dialogue.name: DWARFA03562
dialogue.text: Go on with you, then, and give my best to Xorutt!

dialogue.name: DWARFA03562
dialogue.text: You tell that lazy Xorutt to bring his own barrel next time! Gwahahaha!

dialogue.name: XORUTT
dialogue.text: No trouble finding the brewhouse? Good, I'd say we're ready, then. It's time to learn the most important part of brewing─and drinking─dwarven ale!
